snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton scolded congressional Republicans for mounting a “trifecta against women” by delaying the nomination of Loretta E. Lynch for attorney general and playing politics with legislation on human trafficking.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton scolded congressional Republicans for mounting a “trifecta against women” by delaying the nomination of Loretta E. Lynch for attorney general and playing politics with legislation on human trafficking.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Criticizes Republicans for a ‘Trifecta Against Women’
